trans-unit.source: Project templates and tools for games
trans-unit.target: Project templates and tools for games

trans-unit.source: Shows you what you need to start programming DirectX games for the Universal Windows Platform (UWP).
trans-unit.target: Shows you what you need to start programming DirectX games for the Universal Windows Platform (UWP).

trans-unit.source: Project templates and tools for games
trans-unit.target: Project templates and tools for games

trans-unit.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)
trans-unit.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the [archive](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132)

trans-unit.source: This topic shows you what you need to start programming DirectX games for the Universal Windows Platform (UWP).
trans-unit.target: This topic shows you what you need to start programming DirectX games for the Universal Windows Platform (UWP).

trans-unit.source: First, you need Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: First, you need Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: Get Visual Studio
trans-unit.target: Get Visual Studio

trans-unit.source: [Download and install Microsoft Visual Studio 2015](https://www.visualstudio.com/vs-2015-product-editions).
trans-unit.target: [Download and install Microsoft Visual Studio 2015](https://www.visualstudio.com/vs-2015-product-editions).

trans-unit.source: Topic
trans-unit.target: Topic

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: DirectX game project templates
trans-unit.target: DirectX game project templates

trans-unit.source: Learn about the templates for creating a UWP and DirectX game.
trans-unit.target: Learn about the templates for creating a UWP and DirectX game.

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio tools for game programming
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio tools for game programming

trans-unit.source: An overview of DirectX specific tools available in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: An overview of DirectX specific tools available in Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: Graphics diagnostics tools
trans-unit.target: Graphics diagnostics tools

trans-unit.source: Learn how to get and use the graphics diagnostics features including Graphics Debugging, Graphics Frame Analysis, and GPU Usage in Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to get and use the graphics diagnostics features including Graphics Debugging, Graphics Frame Analysis, and GPU Usage in Visual Studio.

trans-unit.target: Create a simple UWP game with DirectX

trans-unit.target: Developing Marble Maze, a Universal Windows Platform game in C++ and DirectX

trans-unit.source: Note
trans-unit.target: Note

trans-unit.source: This article is for Windows 10 developers writing Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.
trans-unit.target: This article is for Windows 10 developers writing Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.

trans-unit.source: If you’re developing for Windows 8.x or Windows Phone 8.x, see the [archived documentation](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132).
trans-unit.target: If you’re developing for Windows 8.x or Windows Phone 8.x, see the [archived documentation](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=619132).
